Text:
This was obviously uploaded by yet another tracker monger who doesn't really understand how the bit torrent protocol works.

You do not need any trackers listed in a torrent that you upload to TPB.

It is taken care of automatically by the web site software.

That's all well and good if the piratebay's own trackers actually worked. 

When I upload here I always add a few known working public trackers to the torrent as well, because a lot of the time the piratebay trackers are down.
